name: #19 Dursilawati
description:
A princess of Astinapura, the daughter of Gandhari and the only woman in 100 Kurava siblings. Dursilawati was spoiled with riches and fame as a child. Her words and actions are so captivating that they are the perfect tool for Kurava's schemes.  

Dursilawati's husband was Jayadhrata, whom first come to Astina to join Pandava's side. Jayadhrata, enchanted by Dursilawati decided to side with Kurava instead.
